headline: TARIFF FEARS DRIVE U.S. STOCKPILING IN AUGUST, WHILE MANUFACTURING WEAKENS IN EUROPE AND ASIA: GEP SUPPLY CHAIN VOLATILITY INDEX
summary: GEP Global Supply Chain Volatility Index, a leading economic indicator based on a monthly survey of 27,000 businesses, slipped to -0.39 in August, from -0.35 in July, signaling rising spare capacity as global supply chain activity cooled.

content.title: TARIFF FEARS DRIVE U.S. STOCKPILING IN AUGUST, WHILE MANUFACTURING WEAKENS IN EUROPE AND ASIA: GEP SUPPLY CHAIN VOLATILITY INDEX
content.summary: GEP Global Supply Chain Volatility Index, a leading economic indicator based on a monthly survey of 27,000 businesses, slipped to -0.39 in August, from -0.35 in July, signaling rising spare capacity as global supply chain activity cooled.

thumbnail.caption: GEP Global Supply Chain Volatility Index

headline: S&P Global ushers new era of open data access: Introduces S&P Capital IQ Identifiers on DUNL.org
summary: S&P Global (NYSE: SPGI) today announced the availability of the S&P Capital IQ Identifiers on Data Unlocked (DUNL.org), a comprehensive open data portal that provides organizations worldwide with free access to essential reference and master data. The release further solidifies the S&P Capital IQ ID as the standard company identifier for all S&P Global data, with over 25 million companies now available in both human and machine-readable formats on DUNL.

content.title: S&P Global ushers new era of open data access: Introduces S&P Capital IQ Identifiers on DUNL.org

headline: S&P Global (SPGI): A Fresh Valuation Check After Key Leadership Presentations at Major Industry Events
summary: S&P Global (SPGI) is back in the spotlight, and if you own shares or are thinking about getting in, this could be a moment that shapes your next move. The company’s top executives recently took the stage at two major conferences: the Gastech Exhibition & Conference and Barclays’ Global Financial Services Conference. These kinds of presentations are more than just routine. They give markets a window into management's strategy, and any subtle shift in messaging or long-term outlook can ripple...
